properties.name: type
properties.description: the type of the native input

properties.name: padLength
properties.description: length to pad the string (with `0`) according to the total amount of numbers

properties.name: autoPadding
properties.description: enables auto padding

properties.name: minimumFractionDigits
properties.description: The minimum number of fraction digits to use. Possible values are from 0 to 20; the default for plain number and percent formatting is 0; the default for currency formatting is the number of minor unit digits provided by the ISO 4217 currency code list (2 if the list doesn't provide that information).

properties.name: minimumIntegerDigits
properties.description: The minimum number of integer digits to use. Possible values are from 1 to 21; the default is 1.

properties.name: value
properties.description: value of the input

properties.name: propertyForValue
properties.description: defines the property that should be used for the value

properties.name: locale
properties.description: The current locale

properties.name: decimalSeparator
properties.description: locale separator for local decimal values

properties.name: groupingSeparator
properties.description: locale separator for grouping decimal values

properties.name: maximumFractionDigits
properties.description: The maximum number of fraction digits to use. Possible values are from 0 to 20; the default for plain number formatting is the larger of minimumFractionDigits and 3; the default for currency formatting is the larger of minimumFractionDigits and the number of minor unit digits provided by the ISO 4217 currency code list (2 if the list doesn't provide that information); the default for percent formatting is the larger of minimumFractionDigits and 0.

properties.name: minimumSignificantDigits
properties.description: The minimum number of significant digits to use. Possible values are from 1 to 21; the default is 1.

properties.name: maximumSignificantDigits
properties.description: The maximum number of significant digits to use. Possible values are from 1 to 21; the default is minimumSignificantDigits.

properties.name: unit
properties.description: unit of the output (only used when `number-style="decimal"`)

properties.name: unitSeparator
properties.description: the separator to separate value and unit (default: '\u202F')

properties.name: alwaysSign
properties.description: always put the sign at the beginning

properties.name: numberStyle
properties.description:
The formatting style to use. Possible values are "decimal" for plain number formatting, "currency" for currency formatting, and "percent" for percent formatting; the default is "decimal".
notice: min, max and step are not in percent (so e.g. if step is 0.01, it means that the step is 1%)

properties.name: useGrouping
properties.description: if true the number will be grouped according to the locale.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: The currency to use in currency formatting. Possible values are the ISO 4217 currency codes, such as "USD" for the US dollar, "EUR" for the euro, or "CNY" for the Chinese RMB — see http://www.currency-iso.org/en/home/tables/table-a1.html. There is no default value; if the style is "currency", the currency property must be provided.

properties.name: currencyDisplay
properties.description: How to display the currency in currency formatting. Possible values are "symbol" to use a localized currency symbol such as €, "code" to use the ISO currency code, "name" to use a localized currency name such as "dollar"; the default is "symbol".

properties.name: _numberOptions
properties.description: number format options

properties.name: formatNumber
properties.description: number format function

properties.name: parseNumber
properties.description: function to parse the input

properties.name: min
properties.description: minimal input

properties.name: max
properties.description: maximal input

properties.name: step
properties.description: step for changing the input (referencing to `min` or `0`)

properties.name: startAt
properties.description: start where to increment the value

properties.name: valueAsNumber
properties.description: value of the input

properties.name: default
properties.description: default value of the value, when it does not validate

properties.name: saturate
properties.description: if true, the value does not revolve the range according to the maximum or the minimum

properties.name: useNegativeZero
properties.description: if true, the value will break on 0 to -0

properties.name: noClamp
properties.description: if true, the value does not clamp according to the given step

properties.name: name
properties.description: name of the input

properties.name: title
properties.description: description for the element and can be used as a hint for invalid values

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: disables the input

properties.name: invalid
properties.description: required attribute

properties.name: required
properties.description: required attribute

properties.name: valueIsSet
properties.description: is true when the value is set

properties.name: _isSet
properties.description: defines whether the value is set

properties.name: _validate
properties.description: validates the value (when required)

properties.name: input
properties.description: the immediate input string

properties.name: validationMessage
properties.description: message to set on the input to show if the input does not validate

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: the placeholder string

properties.name: minlength
properties.description: the minlength of the input

properties.name: autoResize
properties.description: if true, the width will change when typing

properties.name: _minlengthString
properties.description: string that is used to compute the minimal width of the input

methods.name: reset
methods.description: reset the value

methods.name: _confirmInput
methods.description: update manually the value with the native input

methods.name: _updateInput
methods.description: update manually the native input with the given value

methods.name: _computeMinlengthString
methods.description: compute the minimal string the input is sized for

methods.name: _safeMult
methods.description: Emulating handwritten multiplication to keep precision

methods.name: _safeAdd
methods.description: Emulating handwritten addition to keep precision

methods.name: increase
methods.description: Increase value by step

methods.name: decrease
methods.description: Decrease value by step

methods.name: _shouldPropertyChange
methods.description: overwritten of polymer to handle -0

methods.name: _attachDom
methods.description: attach dom with `delegatesFocus: true` so that the element is also focussed while its's children are too, and to autofocus to first tabable

return.desc: true, if the value is set

params.name: isSet
params.description: The function that defines if the value is set

params.name: required
params.description: if true, the value is required

return.desc: true, if the value is valid

methods.name: _computeInvalid
methods.description: defines whether the value is set

methods.name: _computeValueIsSet
methods.description: defines whether the value is set

methods.name: validate
methods.description: validates the input for iron-form

methods.name: resize
methods.description: called automatically when static `_minlengthString` or visibilityState changes, but can be called manually to resize the minwidth of the input, when the input is for example initially hidden

methods.name: focus
methods.description: focus the input element

methods.name: blur
methods.description: removes focus from input

methods.name: select
methods.description: selects the input text in the element, and focuses it so the user can subsequently replace the whole entry

methods.name: click
methods.description: simulates a click on the element

methods.name: setCustomValidity
methods.description: sets on the native input a validity message

methods.name: reportValidity
methods.description: reports the validity state of the native input
